text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Mostly finished!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Wa Ha Ha! Holding back is unnecessary! Our Tracen Academy is a place where the dreams of Uma Musume are realized! Therefore… it's only natural!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Absolutely befitting! We also requested of you to help us! That devotion to duty… truly admirable!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: However, now is the pivotal moment. Fine Motion, are you prepared?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The final move, from you. …With your own words, convey your feelings to your esteemed father!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Their preparations are complete. Then… commencing communication.
The SP Commander respectfully held the smartphone before her. On the other end, the one waiting for Fine Motion's words was-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -It has been far too long, Father.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "Fine…I've heard the circumstances. In light of that, I shall ask once more. While you've been away from your country, have you forgotten your duties?"

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: No. Even now, my duty and pride remain in my heart. Therefore, I am fully aware of the selfishness in my request.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Even so, I… I myself will follow my heart. Here, right now, I wish to run!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "…Even if you doze off in this momentary dream, you absolutely cannot escape from the duty you were born with. The feeling of drowning in your losses, will tear your heart asunder."

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "Fine… my wise, sensible daughter. The thorny path you've chosen will inevitably lead you through suffering and bitterness. Knowing this, do you still wish to proceed?"

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yes. I do!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Father, you know, I've come to understand. The feeling of running with all your might, to compete, to run through faster than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I can't forget…I don't want to forget. I want to run! I want to test how far I can run with these legs!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "…I see."

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "If you're willing to go that far, first you must prove yourself before me. Your resolve, your desire… your potential!"
And so, Fine Motion would be participating in the upcoming Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: 1, 2, 1,2… there. To fully convince my father, we definitely need results, don't we?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: We definitely need to prove it with results… a run befitting of the family's reputation and the pride it bears.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Nope. Not at all! Rather, I'm excited!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: After all…I get to run!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: All right, Trainer! Can I trouble you to train me to the best of your abilities until the Selection race?
And so, in preparation for the race, Fine Motion earnestly spent day after day training.
And then-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Suuu…Huu!
choice_data_list: Go have fun out there, Fine

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Yeah! I'll be off!

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Trainer-sama, I have finished setting it up. Please head over to that computer terminal.
With her Father watching over her from behind the screen, finally, Fine Motion's race was about to begin!
(WHOOOOOOOOOOA…!)

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "…so you're the trainer, that discovered Fine's true feelings?"

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "Ever since long ago, she's always been very clever. She thoroughly understood the duties and conduct of royalty- and she held back the feelings in her heart"

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "That was how it was. But now-"

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa…!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Not yet… not yet, more!! I can still go faster!! HAAAAAAAAA!!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: (Aah, that's right. It's been so long I've forgotten. My daughter, can make that kind of face-)

text_block_list.name: Young Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Reaaaady… GO!…Ahahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The Selection race's first place goes to, Fine Motion!! It's Fine Motion!! With her wonderful run she grasps victory!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: "…that's right, it's been a long time. Maybe I should be a little more selfish, too. Not as a Lord… but as your father."

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: (Good grief, to think she'd desire the world of racing just like her older sister… is this what they mean by 'It's in your blood'?)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …it can't be true.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It can't be true, it can't be true! To think father would give her permission!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yeah…! If that's the case, there's no choice but to "Party Hard" tonight, right?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahem. Well then, this time too-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Will you escort me? Trainer!
And thus, I became in charge of Fine Motion. And for now- We headed to that Ramen shop where she got that coupon.
